verses.name: 2 Corinthians 10:15
verses.text: Not boasting of things without our measure, that is, of other men’s labours; but having hope, when your faith is increased, that we shall be enlarged by you according to our rule abundantly,

verses.name: 2 Corinthians 10:16
verses.text: To preach the gospel in the regions beyond you, and not to boast in another man’s line of things made ready to our hand.

verses.name: 2 Corinthians 10:17
verses.text: But he that glorieth, let him glory in the Lord.

verses.name: 2 Corinthians 10:18
verses.text: For not he that commendeth himself is approved, but whom the Lord commendeth.
